page.title: 16LOCAL SCHOOL NEWS IN TELFORD
page.content: The following items of local news appeared in the{SHROPSHIRE STAR }and { {TELFORD JOURNAL}during the week {June19th to 25th 1985}(inclusive). Applications are invited for the {Headship}of{Captain Webb Primary {School.}This is the third time the post has been advertised since the previous head retired at Easter. Mrs Margaret Thrower{(the mother of {three pupils at Capt. Webb School}) has gone on a{sponsored diet.}She is hoping to lose 5 stone and the money she raises is to go towards the repair of {Holy Trinity Church}roof. Lee Pickstone,an{11 year old pupil at {Capt. Webb Primary School,}took part in a{B.M.X European Challenge {Competition}in{Holland}recently and was runner up.He was the best{British competitor in the event and he won a large silver cup.
